        Prints a byte value to a StringBuffer as a double digit hex value.

      • pseudoUniqueByteSequence

        public static byte[] pseudoUniqueByteSequence(int length)
        Parameters:
        length - the length of returned byte[]
        Returns:
        A pseudo-unique byte array of the specified length. Length must be at least 16 bytes, or an exception is thrown.
        Since:
        1.0.2
